values.ctor:
<init>()
            Construct a RectEvaluator that returns a new Rect on every evaluate call.

<init>(reuseRect: Rect!)
            Constructs a RectEvaluator that modifies and returns reuseRect in evaluate(float,android.graphics.Rect,android.graphics.Rect) calls.

values.code: evaluate(fraction: Float, startValue: Rect!, endValue: Rect!)
values.desc: This function returns the result of linearly interpolating the start and end Rect values, with fraction representing the proportion between the start and end values.
